lines.text: I'm very good at looking for brothers.
Two heads are better than one, you know... didn't know I had two heads did you?
You said you hadn't slept with any of them!
What is that you like to know?
Is a girl that's been going around with a fellow for a reasonable length of time is supposed to go to the bed with him or not?
What kind of question is that to ask?
Is a girl who's been going around with a boy a reasonable amount of time, expected to go to bed with him or not?
You put on the coffee, I'll bring the bagels, okay? Should I bring anything else?
You can get arrested talking like that on the telephone!
You put on the coffee, I'll bring the bagels, okay? Should I bring anything else?
You can get arrested talking like that on the telephone!
